article_title: Obamacare's Lawless Rollout Cements Case Against Single Payer Health Care

article_metadata.description: VideoAnother day, another delay. Not content with nearly two dozen unilateral changes to the health care law--many of quite dubious legality--the administration yesterday announced yet another delay to Obamacare. This newest delay will permit members of non-qualified health plans in the non-group market to keep them for another two years (through [...]
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
